titleStmt.title: The wall & glory of Jerusalem, in a sermon preached in St. Pauls-Church London, before the Right Honorable the Lord Mayor, Lord General, aldermen, Common Council, and companies of the Honorable City of London, February 28. 1659. Being a day of solemn thanksgiving unto God, for restoring the Parliament and Common Council, and for preserving the City. By Edward Reynolds D.D.
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.

titleStmt.title: The wall & glory of Jerusalem, in a sermon preached in St. Pauls-Church London, before the Right Honorable the Lord Mayor, Lord General, aldermen, Common Council, and companies of the Honorable City of London, February 28. 1659. Being a day of solemn thanksgiving unto God, for restoring the Parliament and Common Council, and for preserving the City. By Edward Reynolds D.D.
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho: Newcomb, for George Thomason, at the Rose and Crown in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The wall and glory of Jerusalem.
In this edition signature B is under the "nt" of "Carpenters". Quire A is in the same setting as the other 31-p. edition.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 13 1659"; also the last two numbers of the imprint date have been marked through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
